word_mean: coherent-video signal 多普勒雷达接收机中, 由相位检波器检波输出的信号。

sentence.Network_en: He appeared hardly capable of conducting a coherent conversation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他好像连话都说不清楚。

sentence.Network_en: Little attempt was made to integrate the parts into a coherent whole.
sentence.Network_cn: 在把各部分结合成一个连贯的整体方面几乎未作任何尝试。

sentence.Network_en: The state is not a unified and internally coherent entity.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国不是一个统一的、内部团结的实体。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 此外相干(Coherent)公司生产的无铝材料半导体激光器(AAA)。基于无铝材料(InGaAsP)半导体工艺，有效地避免了有源区的氧化问题。
大学英语六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... cognitive a. 认识(力)的 coherent a. 粘着的；紧凑的 coincide vi. 恰好相符，相一致.
与….一致，相合coherent a. 聚合在一起的，相干的，comparable a.类似的，可比的
一起-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 两人一起 twosome 粘在一起的 coherent 把…赶在一起放牧 to herd.

list.abs: 2008-10-18 -- 工业控制英语词汇大全 ... Coherence 相干性 Coherence length 相干长度（谐波列长度） Coil size 线圈大小.
石油英语词汇(C4) ... coherence filtering 相干滤波 coherence function 相干函数 coherence stack 相干叠加.
电子工程专业词汇C ... coercivity 矫顽性 coherent oscillator 相干振荡器 coil 线圈.
...或瑞利散射,Rayleigh scattering,或相干散射,coherent scattering,由于内层电子的数目随散射物原子序数的增加而增加,外层电子所占比例降低,所以波长不变的散射光子强度随.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'logically related to'): from Latin cohaerent- 'sticking together', from the verb cohaerere (see cohere)

entry.def: If something is coherent, it is well planned, so that it is clear and sensible and all its parts go well with each other.

example.ex: He has failed to work out a coherent strategy for modernising the service...
example.tran: 他未能制定出一条连贯的策略来实现服务的现代化。

example.ex: The President's policy is perfectly coherent.
example.tran: 总统的政策环环相扣，浑然一体。

entry.def: If someone is coherent, they express their thoughts in a clear and calm way, so that other people can understand what they are saying.

example.ex: He's so calm when he answers questions in interviews. I wish I could be that coherent.
example.tran: 他在面试中回答问题时非常从容镇静。我希望自己也能那样条理清晰。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by an orderly, logical, and aesthetically consistent relation of parts;
2. capable of thinking and expressing yourself in a clear and consistent manner;

sentences.sentence: "she was more coherent than she had been just after the accident"

auth_sentence.content: There is no coherent plan that I can see.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no coherent plan that I can see.

auth_sentence.content: Finally some coherent sanity for the GOP to contemplate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Finally some coherent sanity for the GOP to contemplate.

auth_sentence.content: So I go back to what makes my universe coherent.
auth_sentence.res_content: So I go back to what makes my universe coherent.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 一致的,协调的;[话语等]条理清楚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cohere[v.附着;粘着]+ent……的→coherent粘在一起的;一致的,协调的
co共同+hes粘附+ion表名词→cohere的名词

jushi.english: They seem to have no coherent plan for saving the company.
jushi.chinese: 他们似乎并没有一套有条有理的挽救公司的计划。

jushi.english: His speech wasn't at all coherent, at first,I couldn't understand it.
jushi.chinese: 他的讲话全然语无伦次,起初我没能理解。

jushi.english: He is not very coherent on the telephone.
